title: Rokma
description: Flexible Communication Design Service for small companies. Imagine > Plan > Produce > Launch. Also just consulting!
description_web: Communication has never been cheaper and more accessible. A well thought internet presence reduce the small entrepreneur's stress. An advisor helps rationalize and realize.
description_photography: A selfie always tells the same thing: <<I WAS HERE>>. Photography, is still a new language. Attention is very short, hit strongly and deep into emotions. We all need carefully crafted ideas expressed in pictures!
description_advertising: Nothing that is new, can be accepted without being well proposed first.
description_branding: Your products must be recognisable, that's why you need branding. Or quickly forgotten. Ready to seriously build your product identity?
description_specials: Consulting with an OUT-OF-THE-BOX thinker is paramount for your ONE-SHOT PROJECT success. I will make sure your investment is worth or don't take the job.
keywords: flexible, communication, Ddesign, small companies, plan, produce, launch, consulting, photography, creativity, content, experience, digital-marketing, copywriting, strategy, mentoring, advisor
